db:abstract.db:para: Defines a view point through which the scene will be rendered.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: aspectRatio : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current aspect ratio of the camera.

db:section.db:title: bottom : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current bottom of the camera.
This property is only relevant when projectionType is CameraLens.OrthographicProjection.

db:section.db:title: exposure : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current exposure of the camera.
The default value is 0.0.

The MetalRoughMaterial in Qt 3D Extras is currently the only provided material that makes use of camera exposure. Negative values will cause the material to be darker, and positive values will cause it to be lighter.
Custom materials may choose to interpret the value differently.

db:section.db:title: farPlane : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current camera far plane of the camera. Objects that are farther from the camera than the farPlane will not be rendered.

db:section.db:title: fieldOfView : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current vertical field of view of the camera in degrees.

Along with aspectRatio, this property determines how much of the scene is visible to the camera. In that respect you might think of it as analogous to choosing a wide angle (wide horizontal field of view) or telephoto (narrow horizontal field of view) lens, depending on how much of a scene you want to capture.
fieldOfView is only relevant when projectionType is CameraLens.PerspectiveProjection.

db:section.db:title: left : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current left of the camera.
This property is only relevant when projectionType is CameraLens.OrthographicProjection.

db:section.db:title: nearPlane : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current camera near plane of the camera. Objects that are closer to the camera than the nearPlane will not be rendered.

db:section.db:title: position : vector3d
db:section.db:para: Holds the current position of the camera in coordinates relative to the parent entity.

db:section.db:title: projectionMatrix : matrix4x4
db:section.db:para: Holds the current projection matrix of the camera.

db:section.db:title: projectionType : enumeration
db:section.db:para: Holds the type of the camera projection. The default value is CameraLens.PerspectiveProjection.

db:listitem.db:para: CameraLens.OrthographicProjection - Parallel lines appear parallel. Objects appear the same size regardless of distance.
CameraLens.PerspectiveProjection - Parallel lines appear to meet in the distance. Objects appear to shrink the farther they are from the camera.

db:section.db:title: right : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current right of the camera.
This property is only relevant when projectionType is CameraLens.OrthographicProjection.

db:section.db:title: top : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current top of the camera.
This property is only relevant when projectionType is CameraLens.OrthographicProjection.

db:section.db:title: upVector : vector3d
db:section.db:para: Holds the current up vector of the camera in coordinates relative to the parent entity.

The up vector indicates which direction the top of the camera is facing. Think of taking a picture: after positioning yourself and pointing the camera at your target, you might rotate the camera left or right, giving you a portrait or landscape (or angled!) shot. upVector allows you to control this type of movement.

db:section.db:title: viewCenter : vector3d
db:section.db:para: Holds the current view center of the camera in coordinates relative to the parent entity.
Intuitively, the viewCenter is the location the camera is pointing at.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] viewVector : vector3d
db:section.db:para: Holds the camera's view vector in coordinates relative to the parent entity.
This vector decribes the displacement from the camera (position) to its target (viewCenter).

db:section.db:title: void pan(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the pan angle of the camera by angle in degrees.

db:section.db:title: void pan(real angle, vector3d axis)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the camera pan about view center by angle in degrees on axis.

db:section.db:title: void panAboutViewCenter(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the camera pan about view center by angle in degrees.

db:section.db:title: void panAboutViewCenter(real angle, vector3d axis)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the camera pan about view center by angle in degrees on axis.

db:section.db:title: quaternion panRotation(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Returns the calculated pan rotation in relation to the angle in degrees taken in to adjust the camera's pan or left/right rotation on the Y axis.

db:section.db:title: void roll(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the camera roll by angle in degrees.

db:section.db:title: void rollAboutViewCenter(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the camera roll about view center by angle in degrees.

db:section.db:title: quaternion rollRotation(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Returns the calculated roll rotation in relation to the angle in degrees taken in to adjust the camera's roll or lean left/right rotation on the Z axis.

db:section.db:title: void rotate(quaternion q)
db:section.db:para: Rotates the camera with the use of a Quaternion in q.

db:section.db:title: void rotateAboutViewCenter(quaternion q)
db:section.db:para: Rotates the camera about the view center with the use of a Quaternion in q.

db:section.db:title: quaternion rotation(real angle, vector3d axis)
db:section.db:para: Returns the calculated rotation in relation to the angle in degrees and chosen axis taken in.

db:section.db:title: void tilt(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the tilt angle of the camera by angle in degrees.

db:section.db:title: void tiltAboutViewCenter(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the camera tilt about view center by angle in degrees.

db:section.db:title: quaternion tiltRotation(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Returns the calculated tilt rotation in relation to the angle in degrees taken in to adjust the camera's tilt or up/down rotation on the X axis.

db:section.db:title: void translate(vector3d vLocal, enumeration option)
db:section.db:para: Translates the camera's position and its view vector by vLocal in local coordinates. The option allows for toggling whether the view center should be translated.

db:section.db:title: void translateWorld(vector3d vWorld, enumeration option)
db:section.db:para: Translates the camera's position and its view vector by vWorld in world coordinates. The option allows for toggling whether the view center should be translated.

db:section.db:title: void viewAll()
db:section.db:para: Rotates and moves the camera so that it's viewCenter is the center of the scene's bounding volume and the entire scene fits in the view port.

db:note.db:para: Only works if the lens is in perspective or orthographic projection mode.

db:section.db:title: void viewEntity(Entity entity)
db:section.db:para: Rotates and moves the camera so that it's viewCenter is the center of the entity's bounding volume and the entire entity fits in the view port.

db:note.db:para: Only works if the lens is in perspective or orthographic projection mode.

db:section.db:title: void viewSphere(vector3d center, real radius)
db:section.db:para: Rotates and moves the camera so that it's viewCenter is center and a sphere of radius fits in the view port.

db:note.db:para: Only works if the lens is in perspective or orthographic projection mode.

db:section.db:title: Obsolete Members for Camera
db:section.db:para: The following members of QML type Camera are deprecated. We strongly advise against using them in new code.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] viewMatrix : matrix4x4
db:section.db:para: This property is deprecated. We strongly advise against using it in new code.
Holds the camera's view matrix in coordinates relative to the parent entity.
